author: Simon Difford
description: The fine sweet and sour balance of a great Daiquiri with hints of molasses.
name: Dark Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
15 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
